resources.name: An Online Catalog of Human Genes and Genetic Disorders

externalReferences.description: New insights into genotype-phenotype correlation for GLI3 mutations

query:
From the following patient information, what is the most likely diagnosis? Use multiple queries or reasoning steps as necessary, and provide a rank-ordered list of up to 10 diagnoses, even if there is insufficient information to make a definitive diagnosis. If you are unsure, provide a list of possible diagnoses with the most likely one first.

Patient ID: G13684_Mother
Patient age: Unknown
Patient sex: Unknown
Patient features: Macrocephaly, Syndactyly, Preaxial foot polydactyly.
Excluded patient features: Y-shaped metacarpals, Y-shaped metatarsals, Anal atresia, Nail dysplasia, Postaxial hand polydactyly, Postaxial foot polydactyly, Preaxial hand polydactyly.

function.name: search
function.arguments: {"search_terms": ["Y-shaped metacarpals", "Y-shaped metatarsals", "Anal atresia", "Nail dysplasia", "Postaxial hand polydactyly", "Postaxial foot polydactyly", "Preaxial hand polydactyly"]}

messages.name: search

function.name: run_query
function.arguments:
{"query":"MATCH (d:biolink_Disease)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(p1:biolink_PhenotypicFeature {id: 'HP:0000256'})
WITH d
MATCH (d)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(p2:biolink_PhenotypicFeature {id: 'HP:0001159'})
WITH d
MATCH (d)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(p3:biolink_PhenotypicFeature {id: 'HP:0001841'})
WITH d
OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(excl:biolink_PhenotypicFeature)
WHERE excl.id IN ['HP:0006042','HP:0010567','HP:0002023','HP:0002164','HP:0001162','HP:0001830','HP:0001177']
WITH d, collect(excl.id) AS excluded
WHERE size(excluded) = 0
RETURN d.id AS disease_id, d.name AS disease_name LIMIT 20"}

function.name: run_query
function.arguments:
{"query":"MATCH (d:biolink_Disease)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(p1:biolink_PhenotypicFeature {id: 'HP:0000256'})
WITH d
MATCH (d)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(p2:biolink_PhenotypicFeature {id: 'HP:0001159'})
WITH d
OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(p3:biolink_PhenotypicFeature {id: 'HP:0001841'})
WITH d, collect(p3) AS preaxial_foot_poly
OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(excl:biolink_PhenotypicFeature)
WHERE excl.id IN ['HP:0006042','HP:0010567','HP:0002023','HP:0002164','HP:0001162','HP:0001830','HP:0001177']
WITH d, preaxial_foot_poly, collect(excl.id) AS excluded
WHERE size(excluded) = 0
RETURN d.id AS disease_id, d.name AS disease_name, size(preaxial_foot_poly) AS matches_preaxial_foot_poly
ORDER BY matches_preaxial_foot_poly DESC LIMIT 20"}

function.name: run_query
function.arguments:
{"query":"MATCH (d:biolink_Disease)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(p1:biolink_PhenotypicFeature {id: 'HP:0000256'})
WITH d
OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(p2:biolink_PhenotypicFeature {id: 'HP:0001159'})
OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(p3:biolink_PhenotypicFeature {id: 'HP:0001841'})
WITH d, collect(p2) AS syndactyly, collect(p3) AS preaxial_foot_poly
OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(excl:biolink_PhenotypicFeature)
WHERE excl.id IN ['HP:0006042','HP:0010567','HP:0002023','HP:0002164','HP:0001162','HP:0001830','HP:0001177']
WITH d, syndactyly, preaxial_foot_poly, collect(excl.id) AS excluded
WHERE size(excluded) = 0
RETURN d.id AS disease_id, d.name AS disease_name, size(syndactyly) AS matches_syndactyly, size(preaxial_foot_poly) AS matches_preaxial_foot_poly
ORDER BY matches_syndactyly DESC, matches_preaxial_foot_poly DESC LIMIT 20"}

function.name: run_query
function.arguments:
{"query":"MATCH (d:biolink_Disease)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(p1:biolink_PhenotypicFeature {id: 'HP:0000256'})
WITH d
OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(p2:biolink_PhenotypicFeature {id: 'HP:0001159'})
OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(p3:biolink_PhenotypicFeature {id: 'HP:0001841'})
WITH d, collect(p2) AS syndactyly, collect(p3) AS preaxial_foot_poly
OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(p4:biolink_PhenotypicFeature {id: 'HP:0005490'})
WITH d, syndactyly, preaxial_foot_poly, collect(p4) AS postnatal_macrocephaly
OPTIONAL MATCH (d)-[:biolink_has_phenotype]->(excl:biolink_PhenotypicFeature)
WHERE excl.id IN ['HP:0006042','HP:0010567','HP:0002023','HP:0002164','HP:0001162','HP:0001830','HP:0001177']
WITH d, syndactyly, preaxial_foot_poly, postnatal_macrocephaly, collect(excl.id) AS excluded
WHERE size(excluded) = 0
RETURN d.id AS disease_id, d.name AS disease_name, size(syndactyly) AS matches_syndactyly, size(preaxial_foot_poly) AS matches_preaxial_foot_poly, size(postnatal_macrocephaly) AS matches_postnatal_macrocephaly
ORDER BY matches_syndactyly DESC, matches_preaxial_foot_poly DESC, matches_postnatal_macrocephaly DESC LIMIT 10"}

messages.content:
Based on the provided patient features (macrocephaly, syndactyly, preaxial foot polydactyly) and the exclusion of several other features, I searched for diseases that match the positive features and do not have the excluded features. No disease in the Monarch knowledge graph matched all three positive features and excluded all the negative features, but several diseases matched two of the three positive features (macrocephaly and syndactyly) and excluded the negatives.

Here is a rank-ordered list of possible diagnoses, with the most likely first, based on the number of matching features and absence of excluded features:

1. [Cardiac, facial, and digital anomalies with developmental delay](https://monarchinitiative.org/MONDO:0032572)
2. [Short-rib thoracic dysplasia 8 with or without polydactyly](https://monarchinitiative.org/MONDO:0014214)
3. [Angioosteohypertrophic syndrome](https://monarchinitiative.org/MONDO:0007864)
4. [Megalencephaly-capillary malformation-polymicrogyria syndrome](https://monarchinitiative.org/MONDO:0011240)
5. [Lenz-Majewski hyperostotic dwarfism](https://monarchinitiative.org/MONDO:0007892)
6. [Autosomal dominant Robinow syndrome 3](https://monarchinitiative.org/MONDO:0014819)
7. [Ito hypomelanosis](https://monarchinitiative.org/MONDO:0010302)
8. [Pseudoaminopterin syndrome](https://monarchinitiative.org/MONDO:0010865)
9. [Intellectual developmental disorder with behavioral abnormalities and craniofacial dysmorphism with or without seizures](https://monarchinitiative.org/MONDO:0032883)
10. [Genitourinary and/or brain malformation syndrome](https://monarchinitiative.org/MONDO:0032934)

None of these diseases perfectly match all three positive features, but they are the closest matches in the knowledge graph, each showing macrocephaly and syndactyly, and none are annotated with the excluded features.

If you have additional clinical details or genetic findings, that could help further narrow the diagnosis. If you would like more information about any of these conditions, please let me know!
